title: GMFB: Kyle's Near Death Experience
itunes:title: GMFB: Kyle's Near Death Experience
description:
On this week’s #GMFB Podcast: The crew talks Combine and competing in their own “NYC Combine” (2:40); Kyle’s breaks down his pizza saga (12:05); Nate talks about his experience at the 2003 Combine (19:54), the competitive streak of players while there (24:46) and what pressures are felt while in Indianapolis (27:46); Can you really get a read on a player in such a short amount of time? (31:41); Nate on what he would do differently if he could do the Combine again (35:31); and finally, Kyle discusses his dinner experience with Ian Rapoport (41:09)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
